column4: hello, after all possible permutations and combinations, still LIVE CD wont leave busybox
its my first day of linux .. i cant seem to install it.. i have already wasted 7 cds
did you md5 the iso; it may well be corrupt
.. yes, all basic precautions have been taken
what would those be; please elaborate
such as disk integrity check, burning iso at low speed, and md5 sum check
.. wrote the cds , tested at my friend's place [ we have exactly the same hardware ] .. they work like charm
then I suggest you remove quiet and splash from kernel boot options to see what the exact errors are
they boot nicely as live cd on his pc .. my pc is exactly the same but all cds go to busybox .. following are the errors which i wrote down after doing  noacpi  acpi=off  as was told to me by Seaphor
please try what I have suggested as well
and something like 'bios' failed to hand off ACPE [or something] BUG? .. and so on
without more specificity of the bug and exact error message cant really tell you
and what were the errors shown when removing quiet and splash from kernel boot options
what were the errors with removing quiet and splash from kernel boot options --> paste.ubuntu.com with them please
i would love to do that.. this is my first try of linux, i tried selecting text there but i could not
how to copy and save the text there ? so that i can open the file in windows and paste it
and you removed those (quiet and splash ) from kernel boot options?
yes, seaphore told me that one .. then splash screen doesnt come and many commands run
